title: Can I recite Dua for Istikhara after Witr? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: if I intend to perform do is Tahara lastly before going to bed can I just perform with your prayer and say that the answer is no do I list ihara must be following two Rakas so if you pray only one with a raka this doesn't work if you pray three Witter raka then I would advise you to pray 2 rakaats Schaffer Salaam make the door of Sahara then pray one raka of Whittier and Allah Azza WA JAL knows best
